sourcesContent:
<template>
    <div class="red" :class="{ animate: animate }" />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'Red',
  props: {
    animate: Boolean
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>
  .red {
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 70px;
    height: 70px;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    background-color: red;
  }

  .animate {
    animation: blink 1s infinite;
  }

  @keyframes blink {
    0% { opacity: 1; }
    25% { opacity: 0; }
    75% { opacity: 1; }
  }
  
</style>
